thread.title: Help Adam Save his Baby Boy
thread.title_full: Help Adam Save his Baby Boy

title: Help Adam Save his Baby Boy

organizations.name: portage county department of health and human service

text:
by: Danielle N target: Portage County Department of Health and Human Service's, Wisconsin 
Adam is a great Father to a wonderful baby boy who is a year and a half old now and the Mother has done everything under the sun to take Adam out of his life. Starting with abuse accusations, Physical, mental and even sexual & everyone knows that is NOT true. Now since non of that has worked for her shes resorted to serius Mental health issues, even her own suicide!!! If nothing is done about this who knows what shes going to do. Her train of thought now is if she is at risk for lossing him she will make sure noone has him & thats very scary. We also beleive shes back in active addiction as well, But the babys well being is in serius danger!!! We need to help Adam gain placement of his baby boy for his safety befor something terrible happens!!! Someone needs to listen!!
